resources.string: Please stand upright, relax, and gently wrap the measuring tape horizontally around your body along the bottom edge of your breasts:
Please stand upright, relax, and gently wrap the measuring tape horizontally around your body across the nipples:
Please lean forward 45°, relax, and gently wrap the measuring tape horizontally around your body across the nipples:
After entering all values, click me to start calculating
- All measurements should be taken after a normal exhalation in a relaxed state.
- Do not pull the tape too tight — it should just lightly touch the skin.
- Do not press the nipples into the breasts, and avoid compressing the breasts.
